PiA

Korean: 피아

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Park Sehee

박세희

Age:
27 years old
Group (2022):
D-art

Introduction

PiA (피아) is an South Korean singer. She made her solo debut on 2022 with the single, "Boy, I Want".
She is also a former member of the project group D-art.
